website_summaries.verdict: Supports both traditional and alternative Jenga game play, with the added challenge of oversized building blocks. We recommend supervision for younger players. Ideal for outdoor parties.
pros: Arrives with a well-constructed carrying case
White board for score keeping, plus numbered blocks for additional rules
cons: Blocks are not consistent in weight and dimensions

customer_reviews.title: Soft wood have dents first time it fell down.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it at first. Very clean and easy to handle with the bag and holder. BUT the very first time it fell down now all of the blocks have dents on them making them uneven. The wood is extremely soft. Now when all stacked up they are lopsided. I wish I would of spent more money on a better quality wood game. If you plan on playing on a small table so they land on carpet or grass then you can buy these. But once they fall on a hard table or onto cement they are instantly messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Ddanielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I own a party rental company and my "Giant Jena" games go out almost every weekend. I have 4 sets from another company and the blocks are hollow so when they fall they sometimes break or split open. The Giant Toppling Towers I received from Go Sport is exactly what I have been looking for (solid wood blocks). We love them and I'm sure my customers will too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Coutinho

customer_reviews.title: Difficult To Use
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product for a July 4th party. The blocks adhere to one another. When we tried to remove the blocks, the entire tower would be pulled out of place. We even tried putting a little powder on the blocks to make them more "slippery." The game went unused at the party. We are dissatisfied and will not use the game again.
customer_reviews.author: magazine reader

customer_reviews.title: awesome toy !!
customer_reviews.text: very popular with the kids. awesome drinking game also for parties, picnics, etc. FAIR WARNING !! this is real wood heavy, not that plywood sh#$. make sure to use a flat level surface. be careful with open-toe shoes or bare-feet. watch out for the li'l rugrats, curtain-climbers crawling around. when these things topple, they can hurt. oh yeah, by the way, the flat level surface i mentioned, make sure it's something that can withstand the dings and dents, something you don't value anymore. if you have hardwood floors, cover it up before setting up the game. you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: squirm1966

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great fun for all ages. I like that the blocks are numbered so you can make your own rules. Even turn it into a drinking game if you want! Or just keep it kid friendly. Makes an awesome loud clattering noise as it tumbles to the floor. Adds a great vibe to any party/gathering atmosphere. If you put this directly on the floor it's only about 3 foot. But we use it on an end-table for some extra height. The tote bag is extra handy!
customer_reviews.author: NannerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I love that the blocks are numbered and it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a "recovery" game for when I facilitate group (substance abuse counselor). I love that the blocks are numbered and it came with a board to customize for the numbers. I had been planning to write questions on the blocks, but this is better... now I don't have to write on them and can still customize it with recovery questions that I can change up. So far, I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke O.

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better! My husband and I played it in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger is better! My husband and I played it in our livingroom the first night it was delivered, and we love it. We're throwing an end of the summer bbq party and our new giant toppling tower is the main attraction!
customer_reviews.author: amanda harr

customer_reviews.title: Great and festive for anyone looking for outside summer fun.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Star all the way around. A great addition to your summer time games. The Red White and Blue is great for July 4th, but I love these colors year round and looking to use this game year round. Pieces fit all together just like the should and the coloring is perfect and not cheaply done. I am happy and impressed, well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TB3 Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Great set up, missing alignment for set up
customer_reviews.text: Well built, seems to be exactly what it says it is. Time will tell bout the durability of the carrying bag and the finish on the blocks. Cant give it 5 stars, for the price it should include a little plastid "set up" "alignment" piece of plastic. Just two sides of plastic that fold flat and store in the package. Allows for straiter and more efficient set up allowing more time to play. Overall its a good item, just needs that last little effort to make it great.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne O.

customer_reviews.title: America Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. Not too big and bulky so it's hard to carry around in the sturdy bag it comes with. Good looking patriotic theme helps the party feel totally righteous. God bless our troops and the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fowlkes

customer_reviews.title: Fell and didn’t chip or dent
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are exactly what I was looking for and have been a huge hit. They are sanded super well. I’m going to add polyurethane satin finish to them to make them shine and slippery. This way they will be easier to remove. The tower actually got pretty tall. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a Xmas gift for my daughter and she loved it...just to have a giant Jenga was fun. Yes each piece is solid wood and heavy but that’s what makes it fun. Enjoying each other’s company..
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Great quality block game for parties!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark wood style and it is beautiful! Wood blocks are very good quality, treated so they are smooth with no splinters. Some of them have numbers on which makes for a fun game with the included dry erase board to make your own rules for each number drawn!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkboots

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, my kids use these a lot, I find it is not that challenging in the large size
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are good quality and the bag is durable and so far is standing up to carrying and dragging these blocks around. These blocks are big, almost 2X4 sized. They are not knotty or damaged and they have stood up well to abuse. I feel that the game is maybe too easy with these bigger sized blocks. That said, outside in the wind it gets tricky and get the tower up over the 5 year old's head and it gets tricky. So I think it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good but check other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter. It is a fun game with it being bigger blocks and playing with the family. However after I read the reviews about the blocks being uneven and can affect the sturdiness, it does seem like it can affect playing. I may need to sand them down like a few other reviewers suggested. Which is kind of frustrating considering this game is $80 and they should already be the correct size. I would maybe look at other sellers before purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaidlife

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: ORDERED THIS FOR MY GRADUATION PARTY/GAME NIGHT AND SO FAR THE BLOCKS ARE HOLDING UP WELL. IT EVEN COMES WITH A DRY ERASE BOARD TO KEEP SCORE.. 7/5/19- BLOCKS ARE MUCH HARDER TO MOVE AND MULTIPLE CHIPS ON WOOD WHEN THEY FALL. DO NOT PLAY ON SUPER HARD SURFACE. NOT THE BEST BLOCKS.
customer_reviews.author: melinda esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Chips easily
customer_reviews.text: The blocks chipped after the first time we used it. We made sure to use it on a soft surface too. After each game we would find more and more pieces chipping. The bag it came with is pretty sturdy, and so is the white board. They're also super heavy so, watch your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jocova

customer_reviews.title: Fun and really heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun. The set Is good quality. We went with the stained set and it looks really nice if that matters. This is heavy and watch your feet when this thing falls over! The one thing I’d suggest is the manufacturer make these sets with a lighter wood (in weight) because this will hurt some feet when it crashes if you don’t jump back in time.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at a house party. All of our friends loved the gray color wood pieces and thought we actually had it made to match our decor. It's very high quality and the caring case is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for family fun
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t used these yet but they are the size I wanted in a good canvas container.
customer_reviews.author: Beaulah621

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some of the other stacking tower products and many of them just lack overall quality with uneven blocks or poor workmanship overall. The carrying case is sufficient for normal use, comes with a scorekeeping/rules setting whiteboard, and the blocks are all evenly produced.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Most used party product
customer_reviews.text: We have several sports and teen get togethers at our home, and this never fails to be a bit hit. The little kids love it, the teens, and the adults. Not only is it fun to use in its original form and rules but the numbered game pieces add to the level of challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun game
customer_reviews.text: So far has been very durable and fun! Just he right size, not jumbo sized but is perfect on a table. Come with other game options too. Great for adults and kids!
customer_reviews.author: Lizabean

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my bar and have had a blast with it. I own a restaurant and bar and we leave this out on a table most of the time for patrons to play with. They move one of the blocks and then hand the block to another patron to try to place. It is much more interactive than I thought it would be and its very fun. I've even played it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy as heck, heavy duty. Better quality then some at my local breweries. With they didnt have numbers on them and were just plain. But overall great product. My carrier hasn't given out in me yet so that's also a plus
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Skip this and save the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read through the reviews. This is not worth the money. It is not "giant", we were all grossly disappointed with the size. The wood is treated with something that company says is not polyurethane, but the chemical smell is so overpowering that my kids don't want it in their room. Tried to return it, but you'd be responsible for shipping. So we're stuck either paying $30 for nothing or the $100 for a game that will sit in my shed. SAVE YOURSELF THE MONEY. Lame product and less than mediocre service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for kids to play outside at the lake. Apparently, it is just as appealing to adults (they play more than the kids). The blocks are well made and the pieces slide easily. I have not been able to rate the bag that came with it as it also came in a very sturdy cardboard box which we put everything back into. So, no judgement on the carrying bag - but I can tell you this is pretty heavy to lug around. So, for us the box is very useful. Lot of fun and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great commercial quality
customer_reviews.text: I could've made this but, heck...not for this price! This game has proven itself as a commercial-grade unit to compliment other offerings at our high-volume special event rental company. Happy to have found this without the hassle of making our own!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun and awesome game to play at a party. Just have a large area for the pieces to fall and not break things. Very durable pieces. More of an outdoor game.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Y.

customer_reviews.title: Blocks are Inconsistent!
customer_reviews.text: While the blocks are all the same size, their weights and density are different. So one block can weigh twice as much as another. That makes playing the game difficult. Some blocks are easy to pull out because they are so light, and other blocks are impossible to pull because they are much heavier than the rest. Once the light blocks are out the game is over. Because pulling a heavy block will pull the entire tower with it, causing everything to fall. I am disappointed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Richards

customer_reviews.title: Best giant toppling tower to get!
customer_reviews.text: All blocks are almost exactly the same size. They have a lot more weighg and duribility to them compared to some of the giant jengas offered by other stores like walmart and target. This also comes with a paper that gives ideas and rules on different ways to play to keep the game interesting. It is a great game. The only thing is that it is a little pricey for something that will most likely end up sitting in a closet a majority of the time.
customer_reviews.author: DTala

customer_reviews.title: Solid and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for our patio at the taproom. People love it, especially the employees. Love the additional numbers that you can make up rules! Many laps around the building were ran. Got the grey color and it looks awesome! Sits perfectly on our wooden barrels we use as tables outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: these are great but i gave a 4 for durability, i understand that they will get dinged and damage from playing but all the white ones are covered with grass stains the first use from playing in a yard, no we had not cut the grass that day so it should not have transferred the green onto the blocks like that in my opinion. Otherwise over all good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the 20 something nephew!
customer_reviews.text: No idea what to get my nephew for Christmas, then I stumbled on the large yard games. I feel it's a but pricey but I assume it will last a long long time. Especially like the numbers to be able to play drinking games. I saw some we written rules on each, but I think the numbers and making your own rules is more fun. Who doesn't like the original game? Make it oversized and it's even more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's 35th birthday and he loved it! We all played it (4 kids and 2 adults) all day long. It's the perfect size and very well made. It comes with a nice carrying case. It also comes with a small dry erase board and marker to make rules for the numbers on the blocks! Seriously the best purchase I've made in awhile!
customer_reviews.author: CayteePav

customer_reviews.title: Not 5' high out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: The game is of good quality, sturdy, but it is not a 5 foot high tower out of the box which is what I wanted and thought I read. I think it is written on a bit of a deceiving way but maybe that's just me!
customer_reviews.author: Elektra 2017

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price.. chipped after first game
customer_reviews.text: FIRST GAME one block took a 2inch chip by falling on a wooden serving tray.. FIRST GAME. It was setup on a tray on the carpet. So disappointed. They look nice but some are even different sizes.. you can see clear gaps if you shine a light from one end to the other. Invest a little extra for something better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Taras

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the product. There was a downside.... the blocks are not all the same size. It works perfect for what it was purchased for. It just bugs me/drives me crazy that they are different.
customer_reviews.author: minecraft lover 💘

customer_reviews.title: Uncle Sam wants you to buy this
customer_reviews.text: As I set this up, the freedom surged in my veins and a bald eagle swooped down and perched atop this tower of patriotism. But seriously, this was the perfect addition to our 4th of July festivities and a huge hit with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W

customer_reviews.title: great products!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. GoSports is the company to buy outdoor games from. I have 3 different games now and all hold up to the punishment of young kids. Very happy with them all!
customer_reviews.author: Missminiparker

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family and all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my family enjoyed this item, fun for all ages, the bag is ok but wish it had a hard case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well made. Blocks are smooth and straight. Companies product description was spot on. Storage bag is well made and big enough that all blocks fit and zip up with extra room to spare and appears to be waterproof. Very happy with this purchase and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality wood blocks for a fun backyard game
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are exactly as described. They're smooth and have a nice weight. The quality of the blocks, plus addition of hidden numbers on some blocks, and some ideas for how to use the numbers to alter the rules (and a small whiteboard to keep track) separates this set of stacking blocks from others I've used. Finally, GoSports's customer support was terrific — My daughter lost our case, and they immediately sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Fun game with the kids (5,7,&9). They all got into it and of course loved the big “timber” moment. Maybe even a fun drinking game for adults. Will be a big hit this summer lakeside on the 4th of July.
customer_reviews.author: Garin Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Real backyard fun, but watch out for falling bricks!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it. I have it on a 2.5ft table and the game grew to be over 5.5ft! When it falls, definitely watch out. A friend of mine got hit in the face with a block and actually started to bleed.
customer_reviews.author: heyitsashleyy

customer_reviews.title: This seller is very honest and described the product Precisely as is.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Toppling tower used but like knew so it said and it was totally true. It was in perfect condition and I loved the Grey color of the blocks. I bought it for my sons 21st Birthday party to entertain the kids and adults and it did exactly that.
customer_reviews.author: QueenLeo

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This is tons of fun to play and the random numbers on the blocks make the game more exciting. It also seems durable after using it quite a few times. The bag fits all the blocks and is nice also. The set is a little heavy though. The price is also cheaper than other giant "jenga" sets.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: this backyard version of Jenga is fun with friends. It comes with bag for storage and has options for rules that make the game more enjoyable. Previously I had made such a game for my son, but this was better since it did not involve 4 hours of sanding wooden blocks.
customer_reviews.author: warren s

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this game , it’s a nice game to play during summer at family get togethers . It’s a fun and entertaining game . Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Redtruck Girl

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun, durable
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun, durable...after a few falls, outside party...blocks seem not as smooth playing (sticky without stickyness, if that makes sense), id advice indoor, or if humid...rub with a tiny bit of baby powder each block quickly with hands (so no mess...just a tiny bit), hands only
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love the American flag theme. Blocks are sturdy and smooth and easy to handle. Bag is perfect for transporting.
customer_reviews.author: CarlottaB

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We have played this game quite a bit during the summer. The only thing i didn't like is that when the blocks fall they get dents and chips. We play over the grass so its not falling on a hard surface and the blocks still receive dents. But all in all .. my family enjoys the game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Friends of ours brought to play one night and we had such a good time ordered one for ourselves. We place it on a board and play on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Bin

customer_reviews.title: Big Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My family and friends absolutely LOVE playing this. We really enjoy the game variations provided that is based on numbered blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fun game however the pieces are rough, hollow, and difficult to pull out once playing the game. Don't think the pieces are the same size because when building the tower there's spaces between the pieces. The pieces are pretty small compared to the other giant tower games out there. Honestly buying the more expensive one was well worth it. Just do it
customer_reviews.author: Lakia Renee

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have game
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for an outdoor game night. It was a total hit, everyone wanted to play. We were able to get it as high as 5 plus feet. When it topples over its scary but in a good way. There is a bag to put the parts away. For a neat clean up. If you are interested in a Jumbo Jenga game look no further.
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. I like the fact that they are not pieces of 2x4’s. They are big enough to play outside but not to big as to be a danger to 10-12 year old’s. The wood stack can get pretty tall quick, so this set if perfect
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a super nice case...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product with a very nice well thought out case to make it portable.
customer_reviews.author: DMorton

customer_reviews.title: Great Game.... Fun, Fun, Fun......
customer_reviews.text: The Giant Wooden Toppling Tower game is so much fun to play with or without rules. When your playing with rules, it makes it more fun. My husband and I bought the game with us to a family barbecue and everyone who played loved it. Now whenever we are going to a party at someone's house or a barbecue we are asked to bring it along. The only problem I have is that some of the wooden blocks have chipped from hitting the ground. I will contact Go Sports to see if the blocks can be replaced or if this is something that I should expect to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea Pretty sturdy We took it to the beach; playing on the sand was great. I purchased a crate at Walmart for about $12 to stand it on. Every time we have a get together we bring it out! It's pretty entertaining for at least an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: not smooth
customer_reviews.text: wood should be a lot smooth to use. I'll need to spend many hours I don't have to further sand
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game - Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set to use on our new back patio. We played with it one evening and found that a chunk fell out of one of the blocks on the first use. It is a fun set and I love the red, white, and blue, but I don't think it's going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. We have played it on 3 different occasions and we all(5 years old to 57)love it. It is well made and I have lugged it around lots with no bag tearing problems. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: this is a great game. The wooden pieces are of great quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great game. The wooden pieces are of great quality and the game variations they came up with (and provided with the game) are a nice addition. My only feedback would be to make a bag that is better quality or offer a better quality bag for extra money. The whole set is heavy and I simply don't see the bag lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Powers

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults like it
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit too heavy to carry it but overall it is a good product. During Corona times I bought a few similar games for the backyard to entertain kids. After a few weeks, they lost interest but hopefully, they will play more when their friends come over.
customer_reviews.author: NYC-Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game - Fun for all Ages
customer_reviews.text: We just got the giant jenga and had a pool party. Since not everyone was going to be in the pool the entire time, I wanted something we can have at the poolside and keep others entertained. The game was a hit. I like the large size. Everyone really enjoyed the game.
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun for all ages. I love the twist with the numbers on the blocks - it adds a whole new dimension to the game. The blocks are smooth and durable. I'm so glad we chose these. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for house parties
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a backyard party. It was a hit with the kids and adults. Love that it came with its own carrying case. Seems durable, however some of the blocks weren’t smooth. I don’t think all blocks were sanded evenly. But it serves it’s purpose and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: The quality is nice and the bag is helpful
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reading through reviews and was nervous to purchase this game online. I feared the quality wouldn't be worth the cost. I was pleasantly surprised when I received this version of the game. The quality is nice and the bag is helpful. We will be using them for my nephews wedding and played a few rounds this weekend to ensure that there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game!!! Absolutely perfect! I bought it during prime day and we use this every weekend at the beach. It’s perfect for adults and kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: mom with little kids

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at my daughter's graduation party! We are going to take them on vacation with us as well. It is such a fun game. Yes, they may be a bit costly but they ate made very well and will hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Wise

customer_reviews.title: LOAD OF FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun! Not the quality (or price) of the name brand blocks, but still a lot of fun. The bag included is great for carrying and instead of using the Go-Sports box to line the inside of the bag, I used the Amazon box they shipped the order in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: We are super excited to play this game! It is made very good quality. We are Super impressed and it has a nice carrying bag to boot!!! What I love most is it has instructions for the game and It gives you options to change the game to your company type ( kid friendly, drinkers, seniors)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Size and color as described. Very heavy but that was expected. Only had it a few weeks so I can’t speak to durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor game
customer_reviews.text: We love playing with this. So cool to have a large version of Jenga. We have had fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased gift for my daughter for her birthday party. It was a hit and everyone enjoyed playing the large version of a classic game.
customer_reviews.author: ALA Avi

customer_reviews.title: Fun for ALL ages
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! Great investment! It was less expensive to buy then rent & it is a family favorite for birthdays & holidays. Also, it’s fun for any age. You can play the game or just build things with the blocks. Carrying case very convenient just wish it wasn’t white.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki T

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Aye the best game we played for the family vacation. Was a blast. Everyone loved it. I highly recommend getting a set.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and easy opening. The blocks are already neatly packed in to the carrying case. Comes with a little score board too. I am having lots of fun playing with this with my friends and family. Highly recommend especially during these quarantine times.
customer_reviews.author: Anni Frey

customer_reviews.title: GOT GAME?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jumbo wooden Jenga style game to take camping with us. It is well made, comes with a carry bag, and has proven to be well worth the purchase. My kids even like to play this at home when they have friends over. The blocks are a little heavy, so don't play this game barefoot! LOL
customer_reviews.author: The Paisley Apple

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my SIL for Christmas and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: leeann napper

customer_reviews.title: The big kids loved this set
customer_reviews.text: The big kids really loved this set. It is big and made of sturdy wood. I do not recommend playing this around smaller kids as they could easily get hurt when the blocks topple over.
customer_reviews.author: Matigagri

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Don't be in the way when it fall's, because the block does hurt you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived without issues since it was packaged very well. Of course the package has some weight to it which is to be expected. The blocks come already stored in its carrying case. The case itself isn't the best quality but it serves its purpose (so far). I imagine that I might need to replace it in the future as we transport it from place to place. I would definitely recommend this purchase to those looking for a large yard game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was the original tower my friends have that was fun and easy to play
customer_reviews.text: The bricks are very difficult to get out. I thought this was the original tower my friends have that was fun and easy to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nobile

customer_reviews.title: Not as big!
customer_reviews.text: I placed this item on a table to assist with being a good height; however, I thought the blocks would have been significantly larger than what they were. Overall, it was still a great buy and enjoyed using them. Plus, the additional fun game rules, made it interesting! But, it definitely didn't reach 5ft!
customer_reviews.author: Kar Kar HR

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: We got them for the pool deck. They get a little tight when they get wet, but it’s wood, so that’s expected. We have used them a bunch of times so far, and has been great to use. Just don’t t let them drop on your foot when the tower falls.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tsarnas

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy! But so worth it to watch people playing! Love the bag too just wish it was a little more heavy-duty. The seams ripped the second time I used it, but the bag is still holding together.
customer_reviews.author: Marinda

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: this is so much fun! They are very durable and make for a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Christina O

customer_reviews.title: BE SURE YOU WANT IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: CANT BE RETURNED! My daughter received another one similar to this for her birthday. I purchased this one. I let her keep the other one because it was a gift only to find out I can’t return the one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy wood. We've used it indoors and outdoors on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wedding (we had a series of lawn games available after the ceremony while we went off and took pictures). HUGE hit. The product is made from heavy, sturdy wood. We've used it indoors and outdoors on multiple occassions and it holds up really well. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed! Very high-quality
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the funnest games I’ve ever played with any age of adults. Our children! This is very high-quality and Price , plus fast shipping. I’m extremely impressed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good finish
customer_reviews.text: Tigme quality. Good finish. Nice storage bag. Worked great outside in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth blocks, high quality and great fun.
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a unique guest book for our wedding. Can’t wait to use it for backyard parties and tailgating!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Love this Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game to bring camping. We challenge the kids and they love it! Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mougeot

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We played it for the first time at our July 4th BBQ and everyone fell in love with this game, including our 85-90 year old friends (who played with their canes)! So much fun for all ages! The set is quite well-made and came in a nice carrying case, as well. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Son’s Birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing got it for my sons Birthday party (9 years old) we set it up in the backyard, success.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.text: Was ordered and received within 24 hours! Super fast! The blocks came with a carrying case, a dry erase board, and game instructions. The blocks are sturdy. The instructions offer several options for playing the game we have traditionally played, can't wait to try them all! Would highly recommend purchasing for deck / outside fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: jby

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are not very smooth. Hard to play. Not even comparable to Jenga! VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Good jenga, just smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Nice jenga, but because it's a soft wood, I'll recommend play on the grass or a soft carpet to protect from hard impact and damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiany

product_meta.title: GoSports Giant Wooden Toppling Tower (Stacks to 5+ Feet) | Choose Between Natural, Brown Stain, Gray Stain or Stars and Stripes | Includes Bonus Rules with Gameboard | Made from Premium Pine
